# `learngganimate`

![](transition_manual_files/figure-gfm/unnamed-chunk-2-1.gif)

The goal of learngganimate is to record the discoveries of an intrepid
group of animation explorers in the wild, amazing jungle of [`gganimate` package](https://github.com/thomasp85/gganimate)

We aim to create documentation and share our user experience for this amazing, yet sparsly documented package.

we collectively set our minds to the task of exploring the gganimate
package.
